Our Mission

CAFALL Charity is a nonprofit organization dedicated to making a positive impact, particularly in Africa. We aim to improve the lives of those in need by providing access to essential resources, education, sports, and more. We believe that everyone deserves the opportunity to live a healthy, fulfilling life, and we are committed to making this vision a reality.

Our Team

Our team consists of passionate individuals united by a shared goal: to make a meaningful difference in the lives of others. With dedication and compassion, we strive to enhance the well-being of individuals and communities. We collaborate with a network of partners and supporters who share our vision and values. Together, we leverage collective strengths and resources to bring about positive change.

How You Can Help

Your support is crucial to our success. Whether through donations, volunteer work, or partnerships, every contribution helps us make a lasting impact. We invite you to join us in our efforts to create a better world for all.

Our Founder

Cherif Fall - Founder of CAFALL Charity

Cherif Fall is the founder of CAFALL Charity, dedicated to creating positive impact in Africa and beyond. With a passion for education, sports, and community development, he leads with vision, compassion, and commitment. Cherif brings people together—teams, partners, and supporters—to make a lasting difference in the lives of those in need.

"Together, we can create lasting change and empower communities to thrive."

Donate Now

Our Vision

At CAFALL Charity, we envision a world where everyone has the opportunity to live a healthy and fulfilling life. We believe that addressing environmental and social challenges is key to creating positive change and improving lives globally.

Our vision is fueled by our unwavering commitment to our mission: to enhance the well-being of those in need and foster lasting change. Through collaboration and collective action, we strive to create a brighter future for individuals and communities alike.

We recognize the power of collective impact and believe that everyone has a role to play in making a difference. Join us on this journey toward a better world, where hope, opportunity, and prosperity are accessible to all. Together, we can shape a future filled with resilience and leave a lasting legacy.

Join Us in Making a Difference

Our Goals

Support

Provide school supplies to families in need, ensuring children have essential tools for learning.

Outreach

Distribute basketball shoes and sports equipment to underserved individuals, promoting physical activity and well-being.

Education Initiatives

Support educational programs in Africa, focusing on building schools, providing materials, and fostering literacy in Senegal.

Access

Offer medical support to underserved communities, improving access to vital services and health outcomes.

Stewardship

Advocate for environmental protection and sustainable practices to reduce waste and combat climate change.

Justice and Equality

Champion social justice, advocate for marginalized groups, and combat discrimination to create a more inclusive society.

Support Our Goals

Our Impact

First Backpacks Giveaway

2018

CAFALL Charity held its inaugural backpack giveaway, providing essential school supplies to children in need. This initiative equipped students with the tools necessary for learning and alleviated financial burdens on families. The backpacks were warmly received, instilling a sense of hope and empowerment.

Shoes Giveaway at SEBI Basket Club

CAFALL Charity teamed up with Sebi Basket Club to distribute basketball shoes to underserved individuals in Senegal. This initiative promoted physical activity, enhanced well-being, and inspired a sense of community among recipients.

Shoes Giveaway at POUT Basket Club

CAFALL Charity partnered with Pout Basket Club to organize a basketball shoe giveaway. This initiative provided new and gently used basketball shoes to underserved individuals, enabling them to participate in sports and fostering a sense of community through sports.

Join Us in Making an Impact

Meet the Team

Get to know our dedicated team members driving CAFALL Charity's mission.

Our Operations Team

Cherif A Fall

Founder & President

Cherif Fall plays a pivotal role at CAFALL Charity, focusing on the core functions that drive the foundation towards realizing its vision. His responsibilities encompass strategic design, financial and board management, fundraising initiatives, and overseeing program delivery. With a strong commitment to making a positive impact, Cherif's leadership and dedication are instrumental in guiding the foundation's mission and achieving meaningful results.

Vieux Mamadou Ka

Managing Director

Meet Vieux Ka, our dedicated Managing Director. Mamadou Moussa Ka plays a pivotal role in ensuring the effective organization of meetings and overseeing administrative tasks for the foundation. With meticulous attention to detail, he manages records and coordinates various administrative functions, contributing to the smooth operation and success of CAFALL Charity.

Gana Ndione

Operations Manager Diamniadio

Meet Gana Ndione, our dedicated Operations Manager at CAFALL Charity. With a strong passion for making a difference, Gana plays a pivotal role in coordinating and executing our various initiatives. His commitment to excellence and attention to detail ensure that our programs run smoothly and effectively, maximizing our impact in the communities we serve.

Daouda Mbaye

Operations Manager Europe

Meet Daouda Mbaye, our dedicated Operations Manager based in Europe. With a passion for making a difference, Daouda plays a pivotal role in coordinating and overseeing our charitable initiatives across various regions. His commitment to excellence and strategic leadership ensures the smooth execution of our projects, contributing significantly to our mission of creating positive change.

Ahmet Sene

Operations Manager Sebikotane

Meet Ahmet Sene, the dedicated Operations Manager at CAFALL Charity. Ahmet's passion for making a difference drives his vital role in organizing and implementing our various projects. His dedication to excellence and meticulous attention to detail ensure our programs operate smoothly and effectively, enhancing our impact within the communities we serve.

Coaches & Content Creators

Pape Ndiaye

Basketball Coach

We are thrilled to introduce Pape Ndiaye, a dedicated basketball coach and valued member of our team at CAFALL Charity. With a passion for sports and a commitment to empowering individuals through basketball, Coach Pape plays an instrumental role in our initiatives. His expertise and leadership have been pivotal in organizing impactful programs, including our successful basketball shoe giveaway in collaboration with Sebi Basket Club. Pape's dedication to fostering physical well-being and community engagement through sports exemplifies the spirit of our organization. We are grateful to have him on board, driving positive change and making a difference in the lives of those we serve.

Ibson Faye

Coach & Coordinator

Ibson Faye is a dedicated coach and coordinator who plays a vital role in our team at CAFALL Charity. With a passion for sports and community development, Ibson has been instrumental in organizing various initiatives, including our basketball shoe giveaway in partnership with Sebi Basket Club. His commitment to empowering individuals through sports and fostering community engagement reflects our organization's values and mission. Ibson's expertise and leadership continue to inspire our team and drive positive change in the communities we serve.

Aby Ndiaye

Social Media Manager

We are thrilled to introduce Aby Ndiaye, our talented Social Media Manager who plays a crucial role in amplifying our mission and engaging with our community online. With her creative flair and strategic approach, Aby has been instrumental in elevating our digital presence and spreading awareness about our initiatives. Passionate about making a difference, she brings energy and enthusiasm to our team, driving impactful conversations and fostering connections across our platforms. A valued member of our team, Aby's dedication and expertise contribute greatly to our ongoing efforts to create positive change and inspire others to join our cause.

Ousmane Diop

Content Creator & Coordinator

We are thrilled to have Ousmane Diop as an integral part of our team at CAFALL Charity. With his creative flair and exceptional organizational skills, Ousmane plays a vital role in crafting compelling content and coordinating impactful events that resonate with our mission. His passion for storytelling and community engagement inspires us all, as he continually strives to amplify our message and drive positive change.
